It might not be the latest model, but we are talking about a giant $600 price drop on the most recent list price and a deal that lands $300 under the deal price on the comparable M4 machine.

items.title: First deal strikes Logitech’s new haptics-enabled MX Master 4 wireless mouse at $90 (Reg. $120)
items.summary:
As part of its now live Techtober sale, Best Buy is offering Logitech’s brand-new MX Master 4 wireless mouse for $89.99 shipped. This particular model debuted just last week at $120, and this marks the first-ever discount we’ve tracked for it. Today’s deal knocks $30 off the launch price, setting a new best price to beat. The MX Master 4 for Mac is optimized for Apple/macOS users and comes in Space Black and Silver White colors, and they’re both down to the $90 low today. The standard version comes in slightly different shades and a wireless receiver dongle is also available at $90 low. Head below for more details.

Amazon is now offering the best price yet on the weird and wonderful Death Stranding 2: On The Beach alongside price drops on a host of first-party PS5 titles like Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, The Last of Us titles, Gran Turismo 7, Demon’s Souls, Rise of the Ronin, and more. You’re looking at up to 57% off and you’ll find some highlights detailed below:

  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach $50 (Reg. $70)
  • Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 $40 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part I $30 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part II Remastered $30 (Reg. $50)
  • Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart $30 (Reg. $70)
  • MLB The Show 25 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Gran Turismo 7 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • God of War Ragnarök $30 (Reg. $70)
  • LEGO Horizon Adventures $20 (Reg. $60)
  • Demon’s Souls $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Rise of the Ronin $40 (Reg. $70)
  • And even more…

Many of these deals are also live as part of the Target Circle Week sale as well – be sure to create/sign in to a FREE Circle account first.
